On Nov 29, 2005, at 7:47 AM, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> didoss@... wrote:
>
>> LOL,....yes, that is a whole other story,...it currently takes 4+  
>> hours
>> to run our entire suite.  We use Mock objects, so that  
>> helps,...but we
>> don't use them everywhere.  We also utilize "TestAll" tests, so that
>> helps get you to a scope somewhere between one and all.
>
> It takes 4 hours to run all your /programmer/ tests?! I daresay  
> that is
> a large problem and needs attention! I could understand all your
> /customer/ tests taking that long to run, but not your programmer  
> tests.
>

Ill concur with this.  On my last (Java) project we had 2,100+ unit  
tests and they never more than a minute or two...
